text: ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَهْزِئُ بِهِمْ وَيَمُدُّهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ

translation.en.sahih: [But] Allah mocks them and prolongs them in their transgression [while] they wander blindly.
translation.id.indonesian: Allah akan (membalas) olok-olokan mereka dan membiarkan mereka terombang-ambing dalam kesesatan mereka.
